info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 12:23PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Huerfano and north central Las Animas Counties through 100 PM MDT... At 1223 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Aguilar, or 27 miles north of Trinidad, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Huerfano and north central Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
